title: 14 day ban ended today but didn't actually end?
body: I got a 14 day ban for verbal abuse 2 weeks ago today, at 8:29pm, it's now 9:35pm and i tried to log onto league and I was still banned.. Not sure what to do, if you know what to do help me out

replies.body: It doesn't look like you ban ended until Oct 3. Those times are roundabouts, so you may not actually be able to login right at the exact time 2 weeks from when you were banned. If you can't login on Oct 4, let us know and we can investigate.
